attributes.action: for those in favour of vehicle tracking and road pricing policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see this as a challenge to Transport Minister Douglas Alexanders claim that a petition in favour of the road pricing policy would have a similar responce to that as the petiion for those against.Also to prove how out of touch this Government is.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
